summary:
The Smurfs are tiny, blue characters living in a forest, created by Belgian artist Peyo in 1958. They have unique names like "Jokey Smurf" and "Smurfette," and wear special hats called Phrygian caps. The word "smurf" came from a mistake Peyo made while eating with a friend.

There are over 100 Smurf characters, and they've become super popular! They've been in comics, TV shows, movies, and even theme parks. The Smurfs franchise has made a lot of money, over $4 billion by 2008, making it one of the biggest media successes ever.
title: The Smurfs
